name: Paladin Jensen
descriptions: Paladin Jensen is a paladin of the Brotherhood of Steel in 2277.

A scout for the Brotherhood of Steel, Jensen is apt to make tactical blunders that put both himself and his teammates in jeopardy. He firmly denies that he's a liability. In fact, he models all his actions on his favorite superhero, Captain Cosmos.

After Broken Steel is loaded, Jensen is held prisoner inside a tent in the Talon Company camp at Fort Bannister. He was sent to scout out Fort Bannister in preparation for a Brotherhood of Steel assault against Talon Company in response to their attacks on Aqua Pura caravans but was found and captured.
Paladin Jensen appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.
PC Jensen and his squadmates may continue firing at a dead body, and they won't stop even if one disposes/hides the body.

topics.response_text: Now I'm going to go kick some Talon Company ass!{with exaggerated bravado}
The Brotherhood is getting ready for a little payback. We're tired of Talon Company ambushing our water caravans.{fiercly}
Fine! I'll just have to escape on my own. Don't worry, it won't take me long.
Don't you realize by now, you'll get nothing from me, you damn dirty merc!{sternly, to someone who's torturing him for information}
